xwikidoc.author: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #medsavant on 18 July 2013
xwikidoc.content: <sdumitriu> has joined #medsavant 04:20 <mcupak> has joined #medsavant 07:39 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 08:13 <mcupak> hey sdumitriu 08:13 <sdumitriu> Hey mcupak 08:14 <mcupak> sdumitriu: how are you? 08:14 <sdumitriu> Good, you? 08:14 <mcupak> good 08:15 <mcupak> I'm working with Hibernate Shards, I managed to implement simple sharding on the variants table 08:15 <mcupak> but there are a few things that worry me 08:16 <mcupak> I see some schema manipulation - does the table schema change in runtime? i.e. can you add columns? 08:16 <sdumitriu> Yes 08:17 <sdumitriu> Hibernate has support for that, too, although they don't recommend it 08:17 <mcupak> how dynamic is that? can you add arbitrary columns? 08:18 <sdumitriu> Not sure 08:18 <sdumitriu> But I know that whole new tables are created at runtime 08:19 <mcupak> are sure hibernate supports that? I know you can have that set in configuration so you don't have to rebuild, but I haven't found a way to do it in runtime 08:20 <mcupak> the way objects are mapped...seems like you would have to have dynamic set of attributes or something 08:22 <sdumitriu> This might be deprecated, but you can make a new org.hibernate.cfg.Configuration 08:22 <sdumitriu> config.add(xml) 08:23 <sdumitriu> config.generateSchemaUpdateScript or config.generateSchemaCreationScript 08:23 <sdumitriu> And run that script 08:23 <sdumitriu> This works with XML mapping files 08:25 <mcupak> hmm 08:26 <mcupak> that would still cause problems with entities, wouldn't it? 08:26 <mcupak> meaning you can't add an attribute to map to the new column you create 10:04 <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant 10:50 <misko___> has joined #medsavant 10:50 <sdumitriu1> Hangout in 10 minutes? 10:51 <mcupak> has joined #medsavant 10:51 <sdumitriu1> I wonder where Marc is 10:53 <bvancea> he's not at the office? 10:54 <sdumitriu1> No 11:01 <Jim_> has joined #medsavant 11:02 <misko__> has joined #medsavant 11:02 <sdumitriu1> Look at all the miskos 11:02 <bvancea> yeah 11:03 <bvancea> the extra '_' 's get added automatically? 11:03 <sdumitriu1> Yes 11:03 <bvancea> hehe 11:03 <sdumitriu1> Marc's online 11:03 <bvancea> on gmail? 11:03 <sdumitriu1> es 11:03 <sdumitriu1> Yes 11:03 <sdumitriu1> Starting soon 11:03 <bvancea> nice 11:03 <bvancea> ok 11:04 <mcupak> has joined #medsavant 11:04 <misko__> too many Misko's? 11:04 <misko__> i thought it was just one 11:05 <misko__> excellent 11:05 <bvancea> Misko clones? 11:05 <bvancea> ;)) 11:05 <misko__> hahaha 11:05 <misko__> i am the real Misko ;) 11:05 <marta> you finally did it misko, you drank soo much redbull that you multiplied 11:05 <bvancea> I wonder what would a clone say? 11:05 <misko__> haha misko.fork() 11:05 <bvancea> =))) 11:05 <bvancea> for (;;) misko.fork() 11:06 <misko__> hahaha, i think i need more redbull 11:07 <Jim_> My google hangout username: jim6416@gmail.com 12:03 <sdumitriu1> misko__: We forgot to add you to the hangout 12:03 <misko__> there is a hangout? right now? 12:03 <misko__> does this mean i have to put on a shirt? 12:03 <sdumitriu1> No, it's done 12:05 <sdumitriu1> Oh, you're not even on the mailing list 12:05 <sdumitriu1> http://mail.medsavant.com/mailman/listinfo/development 12:07 <sdumitriu1> misko__: You should join 12:10 <misko__> ok i think i joined 12:10 <sdumitriu1> You'll get a confirmation email 12:10 <sdumitriu1> Which you must follow 12:13 <sdumitriu1> OK, now you're subscribed 19:55 <sdumitriu> has joined #medsavant
